name: vimmerse
description: Come and learn how to transform your still images into dynamic videos that can engage with audiences like never before! Creators, designers, marketing agencies, and e-commerce businesses can animate all their assets in few clicks using the batch processing mode. The Vimmerseâ€™s creators platform serves the state-of-art GenAI and parallax motions with control over motion shape, range, duration, and more! We will also demo our Canva and Shopify apps so that customers who are running businesses using those platforms can take advantage of Vimmerse capabilities seamlessly integrated there.

name: privacera
topic: Build a GenAI App with Safety Guardrails with Privacera
description: Discover how to securely build GenAI applications using Privacera AI Governance (PAIG), the industry's first comprehensive AI governance solution. Learn to merge data from multiple sources, implement classification-based filtering, and enforce fine-grained authorization protocols. Gain insights from Privacera experts to ensure your AI applications have robust data protection and compliance measures.
